rules.description: CapsLock: Y (Cmd+Del) , U (Opt+Del) , I (Del) , O (Fn+Del), P (Opt+Fn+Del)
Capslock: ',' , '.' , N, ';', 9 (Opt ← , Opt → , Cmd ← , Cmd → , Enter)
Capslock: Shift, Ctrl, Opt, Cmd, Fn ( q a s d f )

manipulators.description: letter i to open curly brace
letter O to close curly brace
letter S to open square bracket
letter D to close square bracket
